entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 12:12 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle and Fog
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow after midnight. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
